Unit_Type_Conversion_Rule_SetObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Unit_Type_Conversion_Rule_SetObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Unit_Type_Conversion_Rule_Set_Data.description: Student Unit Type Conversion Rule Reference

description: Unit Type Conversion Rule Set Data

validation.validation: You can only edit rules on the specified rule set. This rule is not on the rule set: [rule].
Specify a valid student unit type. These student unit types aren’t valid: [unit_type].
Specify only 1 conversion rule for each combination of course and student unit types. There are multiple rules for these combinations: [combo].
Specify a valid course unit type. These course unit types aren’t valid: [unit_type].
You can only edit a rule set that is not currently on a policy.
Specify a different name. There is already a unit type conversion rule set with this name: [name].
